description: This file defines a multi-agent system for financial news and data analysis, including agent configurations, instructions, and example usage prompts.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific roles, models, tools, and instructions.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Coordinates multiple agents to work together on complex tasks.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model interface for OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools for web searching via DuckDuckGo.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Tools for retrieving financial data from Yahoo Finance.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to output the response of the agent team based on a message prompt.
